Weight Loss programs

Let's get you to lose weight!

Welcome to the Winning at Weight Loss website is a landing page for Biatric patients and loss injectable users who are looking to establish a nutritionally complete eating habit that supports weight loss and long term weight-loss maintenance. This can also be tailored for achieving short-term weight loss targets pre-surgery. Clients looking for one-to-one bespoke food timetable with constant updates to food menus and follow-up schedules to keep you on track. Group sessions are also available together with opportunities to connect through this platform with other individuals on this path to Win at Weight Loss.

Contact us today to book a free consultation.

Book now

About me

Dr louise Clamp phd

Registered Dietitian with specialised scientific research knowledge and progressive experience in sports nutrition, clinical conditions and nutrition interventions for health & weight management. A doctorate in Exercise Science and a solid foundation in human nutrition, biochemistry & physiology, has facilitated an enhanced proficiency in communicating complex medical & health related topics with clarity and accuracy to a wide range of target audiences from academic to layperson. Scientific knowledge and research experience is coupled with strong written and verbal communication skills, demonstrated through first author publications in high impact peer-reviewed scientific journals and presentations of research at international conferences.

Contact us today to book a free consultation.
